channel.title: Age of Mythology: Extended Edition
channel.description:
AoM gets the AoE II treatment.
Age of Mythology is coming to steam with all expansions and widescreen support. Here's the new features, shamelessly copied from store page. New in the Extended Edition:
[b]Improved Visuals[/b]
* Time of Day * Improved water * Shadows * Bump / Specular maps * Global Lighting * Antialiasing & Ambient Occlusion
[b]Full Steamworks Integration[/b]
* Workshop mod manager * Multiplayer * Achievements * Trading Cards * Leagues / Badges / Events * Cloud saves
[b]Extended Features[/b]
* Twitch Integration * Treaty Mode * Enhanced Observer mode
[url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/266840/[/url]
This excite me more than AoE II HD did, since Age of Mythology was a game I did play back in the days. personally, I think it's priced too high, so I'll probably pick it up during the summer sale as earliest.

New in the Extended Edition:
